CustomField.description: The Weighted Average Cost of Capital (WACC) for the corporation to be used in Net Present Value (NPV), Discounted Cash Flow (DCF) and other project business case calculations.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Weighted Average Cost of Capital (WACC) for the corporation to be used in Net Present Value (NPV), Discounted Cash Flow (DCF) and other project business case calculations.
CustomField.label: WACC
